thread.title: AmTrust Financial Services, Inc. Announces Quarterly Cash Dividends on Preferred Stock

author: cnbc.com
title: AmTrust Financial Services, Inc. Announces Quarterly Cash Dividends on Preferred Stock
text:
NEW YORK, May 09, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- AmTrust Financial Services, Inc. (Nasdaq:AFSI) (“AmTrust”) announced today that its Board of Directors approved a cash dividend per share on the following series of non-cumulative preferred stock:
Series Rate Dividend A 6.750% $0.421875 B 7.250% $0.453125 C 7.625% $0.476563 D 7.500% $0.468750 E 7.750% $0.484375 F 6.950% $0.434375 The preferred dividends will be payable June 15, 2018 to stockholders of record on June 1, 2018.
About AmTrust Financial Services, Inc.
AmTrust Financial Services, Inc., a multinational insurance holding company headquartered in New York City, offers specialty property and casualty insurance products, including workers' compensation, commercial automobile, general liability and extended service and warranty coverage through its primary insurance subsidiaries rated "A" (Excellent) by A.M. Best. AmTrust is included in the Fortune 500 list of largest companies. For more information about AmTrust visit www.amtrustfinancial.com .
For more information, please contact:
